articles.description: A male British Olympic athlete was supplied with banned drugs by an American therapist who is facing 10 years in jail, according to court papers filed in New York.
articles.title: British athlete supplied with drugs, according to US court documents

articles.description: Ten-man Tottenham condemn Nottingham Forest to a fifth Premier League defeat in six games as they underline their top-four ambitions at the City Ground.
articles.title: Tottenham victory at Forest boosts top-four hopes

articles.description: Scarlets' miserable season continues with a shock loss to Challenge Cup newcomers Black Lion at Parc y Scarlets.
articles.title: Scarlets humiliated in shock Black Lion defeat

articles.description: Manchester City are assessing striker Erling Haaland "day by day" as he looks to recover from a foot injury in time for the Club World Cup next week.
articles.title: Man City assessing injured Haaland 'day by day'

articles.description: Former F1 world champion Jenson Button will return to top-level motorsport in 2024 at the age of 44.
articles.title: Jenson Button to race for Jota Porsche at age of 44 in World Endurance Championship

articles.description: Northampton Saints' Tom Lockett scores late try to seal a 22-19 Investec Champions Cup bonus-point win over Toulon.
articles.title: Late Lockett try seals Saints win over Toulon

articles.description: India Test captain Rohit Sharma will not lead the Mumbai Indians for in the 2024 Indian Premier League season.
articles.title: Pandya replaces Rohit as Mumbai Indians captain

articles.description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy says the mounting pressure on Manchester United gives Liverpool a rare opportunity when they meet at Anfield on Sunday.
articles.title: Why this is 'a wonderful time' for Liverpool to play Man Utd

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says managers and referees must work together to help "make the game better".
articles.title: Managers and referee must work together - Arteta

articles.description: Two Santiago Socino tries help Gloucester beat Clermont Auvergne to make it two wins from two in the European Challenge Cup.
articles.title: Gloucester claim fine European win over Clermont
